text: @realDonaldTrump You literally had a great economy & pandemic playbook turned over to you by Obama & you literally killed everything. Like today you spent all of February golfing while calling the coronavirus a hoax despite knowing about it as early as January. #DoNothingDonald you failed the US.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
